name: Multimodal Hate Detection
description: PyTorch classifier fusing Whisper, STFT, frames.

details.title: Implementation
details.text:
We use **OpenAI Whisper** for transcript extraction, and apply `librosa` for **STFT** on audio. 

- All video frames sampled at 1 FPS.
- Data fused with a simple attention layer.

Example code:
```python
import whisper
model = whisper.load_model('base')
```

details.title: Deployment
details.text:
The pipeline is containerized with Docker and deployed on **GCP**.

- GPU inference via CUDA
- Orchestration via Google Cloud Run
